Attention Interviewer: Please ask Consumer the following questions:

questions.question: Breakoffs? More or less with E than D? If more - were the breakoffs at the burn mark? Or at the filter?
Short battery life? Are you leaving cigarette in lighter after it's finished or 'reloading' another in advance of smoking? Are you setting lighter down in between puffs?
Short battery life? When display shows last blinking bar - do you recharge at that point? Do you keep smoking until bars totally disappear?
